title: WHAT IS AI? SIMPLE INTRODUCTION TO AI AND WHY IT MATTERS IN MONEY

sections.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is one of the emerging technologies that focuses on creating systems that are capable of performing tasks that would typically require human intelligence. AI can perform tasks like understanding language, recognizing patterns, learning from experience, planning, reasoning, and problem solving thus allowing humans to focus on more pressing problems.

items.title: Smart Assistants
items.content: Google Assistants, Siris, and Alexas found in computers and handheld mobile devices helps you navigate information, control devices, or manage your calendar through interpreting voice commands.

items.title: Search Recommendations
items.content: Platforms such as Google keep a track of your website activity and send you recommendations based on your preferences. These often come as ads on YouTube and Social Media Platforms.

items.title: For You Pages
items.content: Recommendations are also given through For You pages on social media websites, streaming websites such as Netflix, and YouTube which show related content as what you have watched in the past.

chapters.title: How AI Helps in Making Money Decisions

items.title: Google Pay
items.content: Tracks your spending and shows you where you spend the most to help you manage your budget.

items.title: PayTM's AI
items.content: Suggests savings plans or bill payment reminders based on your activity.

items.title: Personal Finance Managers (PFMs)
items.content: Analyze Transaction data to provide insight into spending habits and suggest improvements.

items.title: Robo-Advisors
items.content: AI that does the work of an Investment Advisor. Use algorithms to manage portfolios and provide investment management services. More convenient and efficient for users.

sections.content: Apps like Walnut and MoneyView track your spending habits and give you personalized tips to save money based on what you spend the most on (like food, transportation, etc.).

sections.title: AI Helps Manage Your Money Better
sections.content: AI can help you budget, save money, and prevent fraud. It can even help you keep track of bill payments avoiding missing any or keep an eye on your spending habits.
If you use PhonePe or Google Pay, AI helps you track your spending, categorize your expenses, and notifies you about deals or discounts based on past data.

chapters.title: Why Should You Care About AI?

sections.content: Understanding AI is crucial in today's financial landscape as it directly impacts how we manage money, make investments, and protect our financial information.
Computer programs that use Artificial Intelligence to simulate human conversations.
Natural Language Processing (NLP) allows chatbots to understand and respond to human language.

items.title: HDFC Bank's EVA (Electronic Virtual Assistant)
items.content: Answers customer queries 24/7 about transactions, account balances, and loan status.

items.title: ICICI Bank's iPal
items.content: Helps users with everything from checking their bank balances to providing product recommendations (e.g., credit cards, loans).
